tool_description: The Temp mail API provides users with the ability to generate temporary, disposable email addresses swiftly and securely. This tool is ideal for protecting personal email accounts from spam, testing, signing up for services, and more. With various endpoints offering functionalities like email creation, inbox retrieval, and message extraction, the Temp email API ensures you have full control over your disposable emails. Its integration via RapidAPI guarantees a smooth, quick, and secure develo...
title: Temp Email

api_list.name: Create Email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/email/create"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch ALL Emails
api_list.description: Get email messages of the provided Email Token

required_parameters.name: email_token
required_parameters.default: Get email messages of the provided Email Token

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/messages/{email_token}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete Email
api_list.description: Delete the current email and create a new one

required_parameters.name: email_token
required_parameters.default: The email token you want to delete

api_list.code:

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete Message
api_list.description: Delete a specific email message by message ID

required_parameters.default: The ID of the message you want to Detele

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch Message
api_list.description: Get message of the provided message ID

required_parameters.name: message_id
required_parameters.default: The ID of the message you want to fetch

api_list.code:

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Change Email

required_parameters.name: email_token
required_parameters.default: OLD Email you want to Change

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.default: Your custom username or email ID

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/email/change/{email_token}/{username}/{domain}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
